Debrief.Wrappers.Track

Class TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.Plottables
      • Debrief.Wrappers.Track.TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Plottable>, java.util.EventListener, CanEnumerate, Editable, HasEditables, Layer, Plottable, PlottablesType, Renamable, SupportsPropertyListeners

    public abstract static class TrackWrapper_Support.BaseItemLayer
extends Plottables
implements Layer, SupportsPropertyListeners
    convenience class that makes our plottables look like a layer
